arts.ttl: Diego Rossi and Steven Moreira score goals as Crew beats St. Louis 2-1
arts.sum: Diego Rossi scored in the 55th minute and Steven Moreira added a goal and Patrick Schulte had five saves on Sunday night to help the Columbus Crew beat St. Louis City 2-1 for their third win in a row. Patrick Schulte finished with five saves, including an acrobatic one-hand stop of in the 88th minute, for Columbus (5-0-3).
